critique: This executive order aims to promote equal opportunity in federal employment and by government contractors, prohibiting discrimination based on race, creed, color, or national origin. It establishes mechanisms for enforcement and compliance. It expands federal oversight and intervention in employment practices to ensure non-discrimination. It also touches on labor union practices. It does not directly address immigration, national security, or civil liberties beyond the scope of employment discrimination. It promotes diversity and inclusion within the specified categories.
